cta.title: Join CTF-Sweden today
cta.description: Become part of Sweden's leading network for CTF enthusiasts and cybersecurity experts.

sponsors.title: Our partners
sponsors.interested: Interested in becoming a partner? Contact us!

missing_team.title: Is your team missing?

ctfkongress.title: CTF-Kongress
ctfkongress.subtitle: Sweden's largest network for Capture The Flag enthusiasts

network.title: About the network
network.description: CTF-Kongress is a network that brings together individuals, teams, and organizations interested in Capture The Flag (CTF) in Sweden. We serve as a platform for knowledge sharing, collaboration, and development in the cybersecurity field with a focus on CTF competitions.
network.membership: With over 200 members from across the country, we represent a broad spectrum of knowledge and experience in cybersecurity.

goals.title: Our goals
goals.item1: To promote knowledge exchange between CTF players and teams in Sweden
goals.item2: To help organize and improve CTF competitions in Sweden
goals.item3: To represent Sweden internationally within the CTF community

event.title: Annual event
event.description: Each year, we organize the CTF-Kongress event where members from across the country gather to share knowledge, get to know each other, and discuss the development of the CTF scene in Sweden. This event has become an important meeting place for strengthening the community and finding new collaborations.

details.title: Event details
details.location_value: Rotates between different cities in Sweden

activities.title: Activities
activities.item1: Workshops on CTF techniques and strategies

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Anyone who is a member of the network is welcome to participate. To become a member, you just need to register on our website or Discord.
faq.q2: Is there a cost to participate?
faq.a2: There is a small participation fee that covers food and venues during the event. The exact cost varies from year to year.
faq.q3: How can I help organize the event?
faq.a3: We're always looking for volunteers! Contact us via email or Discord if you want to help out.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Do you have questions or want to know more about CTF-Kongress? We're happy to help!

about.title: About us
about.description: CTF-Kongress is a network that brings together Capture The Flag teams and competition organizers throughout Sweden. We meet in the forum on Discord and at the annual CTF-Kongress event.
about.vision: Our goal is to build a strong CTF scene in Sweden by sharing knowledge and promoting the competition format.
